name: Flipping Beat (Atzi_ Games)
description:
Flipping Beat is an addicting rhythm experience you have never seen before! Enjoy all the unique easy and Demon-hard levels and flip your way through the pulsing music beats, surrounded by an abstract world. Use your keyboard to blow up the beats as they come flying at you. Once you start playing you won't be able to stop it!

Features
  • Feel the Rhythm: Immerse yourself in the iconic intense game: The Flipping Beat
  • Default & Human-made levels: Enjoy the default levels, or create your own one!
  • Level up in Leagues: Get better every day and get up to the Legendary League.
  • Rise Up the Leaderboards: Compete against other Beat players around the world.
  • Easy to Learn, Fun to Master: Everyone can understand the basic game mechanics. Get better, have fun!
